issue.title: [CF 104] Item Cooldown Tracking not working properly
issue.body:
ATTACHING A SAVED VARIABLES FILE/SCREENSHOT WILL GET YOUR TICKET ANSWERED MUCH FASTER

Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Just logging on produces the problem.
2.
3.

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
The Icon to only appear when it is usable with an alpha of 30%, instead I see an constant icon with 100% alpha.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
TellMeWhen 3.0.2b

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No.

Please provide any additional information below.


> Posted by CurseForge user Bigbur | Imported from CurseForge issue #104 | Raw
